long_description: The Patagonia Down sweater for toddler girls is perfect for frosty mornings, crisp evenings and brisk mountain air. Keep your little one warm and hibernation-free! 100% recycled polyester shell is tear-resistant and windproof; Deluge(R) water-repellent finish causes snow and rain to bead up and roll off. Premium European 600-fill-power goose down insulation is extremely warm, lightweight and compressible. Details include quilted-through construction, lightweight coil zippers throughout, nylon-bound cuffs and drawcord hem. The Patagonia Down sweater features zippered hand pockets.
